评论详情: I freaking love this bag. I wear it everyday and I always receive compliments on it. It’s good quality and I added a cherry charm as well.
super super cute but it smells awful and the smell won't come out and it seems to only be getting worse :(

I picked up this adorable purse for my teenage daughter since she was on the hunt for a new one! It's super durable and has plenty of room for all her essentials. I love the cute little bows on the front—they really add a fun touch! She’s excited to jazz it up with some keychains and clips. Plus, the dark shiny black color is just perfect. She’s absolutely loving it!
It’s a cute bag and looks like the picture but it smells like fish and doesn’t come out :(
I like the size and style! Smells strange, like seafood though. And I was hoping the handles were more stiff.
I’m so obsessed with this bag. Oroginally bought to match some shoes I have but the tone was off, but ended up falling in love with the bag and now I need to find shoes for it.
Really cute and roomy bag, I highly recommend! For its price, it’s pretty good quality.
I love this bag, it’s my go to for nights out. It holds a lot surprisingly and the color goes with every outfit. great quality!

I am of mixed opinions on this purse.  It is a great size with a roomy interior without feeling bulky.  The handle is the right length to easily sling over your shoulder.  On the down side, the material is very shiny and reminds me more of vinyl than leather making it look cheap.  The material also makes it easy to slide off your shoulder.  The pockets in front are on the small side so could be used for change or maybe earbuds, but not big enough to hold a phone.Not my favorite purse but it will work for everyday use and runs to the grocery store.

Great bag! You get what you pay for. The bag came in a bit deformed but it doesn't take much to whip it back into shape. The material feels very smooth and has a cheap feel but what else do you expect from a $30 bag off of Amazon? Looks exactly like the listing picture, however I don't recommend wearing this with thick outerwear since the straps can be prone to falling off due to its smooth, flexible surface. The bag itself however, is very roomy and is about the size of my 13 inch laptop screen. It also has a small compartment inside the bag in the back to store other materials which I like. I can see myself storing a lot of items in here. Overall, a great purchase.
very cute bag and decent quality for the price! good for streetwear and casual outfits.
Perfect handbag for a night out. Great material, good quality.

I wanted a bag that was cute and classy and this red moment is perfect!! Would hold just the right amount of things for going out like perfume, phone, wallet, lip gloss, charger and gum! I love how the zippers come from both sides for easy access. I just think this purse is great and nothing wrong with it!!
